tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE building_permits (
  permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  project_address VARCHAR(255),
  permit_type VARCHAR(50),
  issue_date DATE,
  expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_type VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    permit_date DATE,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    permit_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    project_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    permit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    permit_status VARCHAR(50),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    project_location VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_location VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contractors (
    contractor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contractor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contractor_type VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    contractor_location VARCHAR(255),
    projects_assigned INT
);

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_type VARCHAR(255),
    issue_date DATE,
    contractor_id INT,
    project_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE BuildingPermits
(
   permit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   permit_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   address VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
   issue_date DATE,
   expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ConstructionProjects
(
   project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   project_manager VARCHAR(50),
   start_date DATE,
   completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Contractors
(
   contractor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   contractor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   contact_person VARCHAR(50),
   contact_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectAssignments
(
   assignment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   project_id INT REFERENCES ConstructionProjects(project_id),
   contractor_id INT REFERENCES Contractors(contractor_id),
   start_date DATE,
   completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PermitHistory
(
   history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   permit_id INT REFERENCES BuildingPermits(permit_id),
   status VARCHAR(20),
   change_date DATE,
   notes TEXT
);
